addcom.addkeys: Adds keys to a vehicle for someone.
addcom.givekeys: Hand over the keys to someone. If no ID, gives to closest person or everyone in the vehicle.
addcom.remove_keys: Remove keys to a vehicle for someone.

notify.failed_lockedpick: You fail to find the keys and get frustrated.
notify.fpid: Fill out the player ID and Plate arguments
notify.keys_taken: You get keys to the vehicle!
notify.no_keys: You don't have keys to this vehicle.
notify.not_near: There is nobody nearby to hand keys to
notify.vehicle_lockedpick: You managed to pick the door lock open!
